channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Jetson TX2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Jetson TX2

item.title: CVE-2018-6239|2024-08-05T06:01:48.089Z -- nvidia -- jetson%20tx2
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson TX2 contains a vulnerability by means of speculative execution where local and unprivileged code may access the contents of cached information in an unauthorized manner, which may lead to information disclosure. The updates apply to all versions prior to R28.3.
